Title: Relates to limiting eligibility for limited credit time allowances to those incarcerated individuals having completed eighty percent of their original sentence
Summary: Relates to limiting eligibility for limited credit time allowances to those incarcerated individuals having completed eighty percent of their original sentence.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to eligibility for limited credit time allowances for incarcerated individuals serving indeterminate or determinate sentences imposed for specified offenses
